string.value: #p2111002#, the missing alchemist. What he wanted, and the dark truth behind #m261000000#... All these previously hidden facts have been revealed. Now it's the matter of choice. If I am to choose the truth, then I'll have to head over to #b#p2111004##k.
The truth must be told, even if it causes heartbreak and anger. Once I get myself ready to reveal the truth, I better hand in #b#t4161033##k to #p2111004#.
With trembling hands, #p2111004# received #t4161033#. There was no way to tell how she'd react to it, whether to be angry, sad, in despair...or forgive. It's all up to her now.

Ahh... You're finally here. What did you find out from #p2111002#'s home? If you had found a clue or two about what he really wanted... what he really strived for... then please tell me. I would love to know.
Why do you look so sad, though? Was #p2111002#... really the guilty one? It's okay if he is, I just want to find out the truth, so please tell me what really happened.
So this... is the notebook that #p2111002# used before he went missing? Ahh... thank you... thank you so much. So this book reveals the whole truth about what really went on in #p2111002#'s mind?

I am almost afraid to open this book. Part of me is afraid to find out if he's truly the guilty one... and part of me still wants to defend him nonetheless... but whatever the truth is, I am ready to accept it.
I guess you aren't ready to show me what really transpired on that day and beyond...
